<js>
var Magua = new JavaImporter();
Magua.importPackage(
Packages.java.lang,
Packages.java.security,
);
with(Magua) {
  function strToMd5(str) {
Â    let md5 = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
Â    let bytes = md5.digest(String(str).getBytes());
Â    let stringBuffer = new StringBuilder();
    let bt = null;
Â    bytes.forEach(a => {
Â Â Â    bt = a & 0xff;
Â Â Â    if (bt < 16) {
Â Â Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append("0");
Â Â   Â  }
Â Â Â    stringBuffer.append(Integer.toHexString(bt));
Â    });
Â    return stringBuffer.toString();
  }
}
function getSig(timestamp, params) {
  return strToMd5("45667191c50941a1a777dfbd84345fe8" + timestamp + params);
}

if (baseUrl.match("key=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("key=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  keyword: String(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("date=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("date=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: 39,
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0,
  date: parseInt(input[0])
  });
  var url = "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/infov1&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
 result= JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else if (baseUrl.match("id=")) {
  var input = decodeURI(baseUrl.split("id=")[1]).split("&page=")
  var timestamp = new Date().getTime();
  var params = JSON.stringify({
  v: 1,
  t: 0,
  id: parseInt(input[0]),
  page: parseInt(input[1]),
  count: 30,
  filter: 0
  });
  var url =  "http://api.ilikemanga.com/request.php?method=theme/info&timestamp=comic/search&timestamp="+timestamp+"&param="+params+"&sig="+getSig(timestamp,params);
  result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).comics
} else {
  result=JSON.parse(result).data
}
JSON.stringify(result)
</js>$.[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var json=JSON.parse(result).Data;
var bid=json.BookId;
var base="https://m.qidian.com/book/"+bid+"/";

json.Chapters.slice(1).map(ch=>({
title:ch.N,
link:base+ch.C,
vip:ch.V,
time:java.timeFormat(ch.T)
}))
</js>

};

book;
</js>

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function fixNum(n) {
  return String(n)
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{7}/g, '$1.$2äº¿')
    .replace(/(\d+)(\d)\d{3}/g, '$1.$2ä¸‡')
    .replace(/\.0([ä¸‡äº¿])/g, '$1');
}

JSON.parse(String(result)).ranklist.map(o => {
  var subCateName = o.subCateName ? ' Â· ' + o.subCateName : '';
  var tags = [
    o.categoryName + subCateName,
    o.serialStatus == 0 ? 'è¿è½½' : 'å®Œç»“'
  ];
  if (o.totalClick) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.totalClick) + 'ç‚¹å‡»');
  }
  if (o.number) {
    tags.push(fixNum(o.number) + 'æœˆç¥¨');
  }

  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
    author: o.authorName,
    intro: o.description,
    kind: tags.join(','),
    latest: o.updteChapterName,
    cover: 'http://static.zongheng.com/upload' + o.coverUrl,
    url: 'http://book.zongheng.com/book/' + o.bookId + '.html'
  };
});
</js>
ruleExplore.name: name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var keyword = baseUrl.match(/keyword=([^=&]+)/)[1];

var searchBooks = JSON.parse(
  String(
    java.ajax(
      'https://m.zongheng.com/h5/ajax/search?h5=1&pageNum=1&field=all&pageCount=5&keywords=' +
        keyword
    )
  )
).searchlist.searchBooks;

var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result));

var searchResults = J.select('.search-result-list').toArray();

searchBooks.map(o => {
  return {
    id: o.bookId,
    name: o.bookName,
